About Me

Hello! My name is Renato. I live in the Philippines. I make my living as a Back-end Developer with full-stack experience for 3 years and 8 months. I am a tenacious self-taught self-learned Node.js and React.js. I used to be a Web developer using PHP and MYSQL for 2 years and 3 months before jumping in the popular Node.js. I really love doing logic stuff.

I have contributed to open source projects, and always stay attuned to the newest frameworks.

Personal things, I

  • Am a breadwinner of my family.
  • Love reading useful materials like coding resources and docs.
  • Am motivated to do Open-Source.
  • Love to play basketball
